alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:26AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Grant, south central Sierra, northeastern Luna and northwestern Dona Ana Counties through 615 AM MDT... At 526 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Faywood, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Faywood, Nutt, Lake Valley, Uvas Valley, Macho Springs Wind Farm, and Cookes Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
